-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | CSS 2.1 syntax
--   
--   library for building and pretty printing CSS 2.1 code
@package language-css
@version 0.0.3


-- | Css2.1 syntax
--   
--   haskell translation of css 2.1 grammar.
--   
--   See <a>http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/grammar.html</a> and
--   <a>http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/syndata.html</a>
module Language.Css.Syntax
data StyleSheet
StyleSheet :: (Maybe AtCharSet) -> [AtImport] -> [StyleBody] -> StyleSheet
data StyleBody
SRuleSet :: RuleSet -> StyleBody
SAtMedia :: AtMedia -> StyleBody
SAtPage :: AtPage -> StyleBody
SAtFontFace :: AtFontFace -> StyleBody

-- | @charset
data AtCharSet
AtCharSet :: String -> AtCharSet

-- | @import
data AtImport
AtImport :: ImportHead -> [Ident] -> AtImport
data ImportHead
IStr :: String -> ImportHead
IUri :: Uri -> ImportHead

-- | @media
data AtMedia
AtMedia :: [Ident] -> [RuleSet] -> AtMedia

-- | @page
data AtPage
AtPage :: (Maybe Ident) -> (Maybe PseudoPage) -> [Decl] -> AtPage
type PseudoPage = Ident

-- | @font-face
data AtFontFace
AtFontFace :: [Decl] -> AtFontFace
data RuleSet
RuleSet :: [Sel] -> [Decl] -> RuleSet

-- | Declaration
data Decl
Decl :: (Maybe Prio) -> Prop -> Expr -> Decl

-- | Property
type Prop = Ident

-- | sets <tt>!important</tt> declaration
data Prio
Important :: Prio
data Expr

-- | single value
EVal :: Value -> Expr

-- | slash separated expressions
SlashSep :: Expr -> Expr -> Expr

-- | comma separated expressions
CommaSep :: Expr -> Expr -> Expr

-- | space separated expressions
SpaceSep :: Expr -> Expr -> Expr

-- | Selector
data Sel

-- | single selector
SSel :: SimpleSel -> Sel

-- | ' '
DescendSel :: Sel -> Sel -> Sel

-- | '&gt;'
ChildSel :: Sel -> Sel -> Sel

-- | '+'
AdjSel :: Sel -> Sel -> Sel

-- | Simple selector
data SimpleSel

-- | Universal selector
UnivSel :: [SubSel] -> SimpleSel

-- | Type selector
TypeSel :: Element -> [SubSel] -> SimpleSel
data SubSel

-- | attribute selector
AttrSel :: Attr -> SubSel

-- | '.'
ClassSel :: Class -> SubSel

-- | '#'
IdSel :: Id -> SubSel

-- | pseudo classes/elements
PseudoSel :: PseudoVal -> SubSel
type Element = String

-- | attribute selector
data Attr
Attr :: AttrIdent -> Attr

-- | '='
AttrIs :: AttrIdent -> AttrVal -> Attr

-- | '~='
AttrIncl :: AttrIdent -> AttrVal -> Attr

-- | '|='
AttrBegins :: AttrIdent -> AttrVal -> Attr
type Class = String
type Id = String
type AttrIdent = String
type AttrVal = String
data PseudoVal
PIdent :: Ident -> PseudoVal
PFunc :: Func -> PseudoVal
data Value
VDeg :: Deg -> Value
VRad :: Rad -> Value
VGrad :: Grad -> Value
VColor :: Color -> Value
VHz :: Hz -> Value
VKHz :: KHz -> Value
VFunc :: Func -> Value
VIdent :: Ident -> Value
VInt :: Int -> Value
VEm :: Em -> Value
VEx :: Ex -> Value
VPx :: Px -> Value
VIn :: In -> Value
VCm :: Cm -> Value
VMm :: Mm -> Value
VPc :: Pc -> Value
VPt :: Pt -> Value
VDouble :: Double -> Value
VPercentage :: Percentage -> Value
VString :: String -> Value
VMs :: Ms -> Value
VS :: S -> Value
VUri :: Uri -> Value
data Ident
Ident :: String -> Ident
data Func
Func :: Ident -> Expr -> Func

-- | &lt;angle&gt;
data Deg
Deg :: Double -> Deg

-- | &lt;angle&gt;
data Rad
Rad :: Double -> Rad

-- | &lt;angle&gt;
data Grad
Grad :: Double -> Grad

-- | &lt;color&gt;
data Color
Cword :: String -> Color
Crgb :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Color

-- | &lt;frequency&gt;
data Hz
Hz :: Double -> Hz

-- | &lt;frequency&gt;
data KHz
KHz :: Double -> KHz

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data Em
Em :: Double -> Em

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data Ex
Ex :: Double -> Ex

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data Px
Px :: Int -> Px

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data In
In :: Double -> In

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data Cm
Cm :: Double -> Cm

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data Mm
Mm :: Double -> Mm

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data Pc
Pc :: Double -> Pc

-- | &lt;length&gt;
data Pt
Pt :: Int -> Pt

-- | &lt;percentage&gt;
data Percentage
Percentage :: Double -> Percentage

-- | &lt;time&gt;
data Ms
Ms :: Double -> Ms

-- | &lt;time&gt;
data S
S :: Double -> S

-- | &lt;uri&gt;
data Uri
Uri :: String -> Uri
instance Eq Ident
instance Show Ident
instance Eq AtCharSet
instance Show AtCharSet
instance Eq Prio
instance Show Prio
instance Eq Attr
instance Show Attr
instance Eq Deg
instance Show Deg
instance Eq Rad
instance Show Rad
instance Eq Grad
instance Show Grad
instance Eq Color
instance Show Color
instance Eq Hz
instance Show Hz
instance Eq KHz
instance Show KHz
instance Eq Em
instance Show Em
instance Eq Ex
instance Show Ex
instance Eq Px
instance Show Px
instance Eq In
instance Show In
instance Eq Cm
instance Show Cm
instance Eq Mm
instance Show Mm
instance Eq Pc
instance Show Pc
instance Eq Pt
instance Show Pt
instance Eq Percentage
instance Show Percentage
instance Eq Ms
instance Show Ms
instance Eq S
instance Show S
instance Eq Uri
instance Show Uri
instance Eq Value
instance Show Value
instance Eq Func
instance Show Func
instance Eq Expr
instance Show Expr
instance Eq PseudoVal
instance Show PseudoVal
instance Eq SubSel
instance Show SubSel
instance Eq SimpleSel
instance Show SimpleSel
instance Eq Sel
instance Show Sel
instance Eq Decl
instance Show Decl
instance Eq RuleSet
instance Show RuleSet
instance Eq AtMedia
instance Show AtMedia
instance Eq AtFontFace
instance Show AtFontFace
instance Eq AtPage
instance Show AtPage
instance Eq StyleBody
instance Show StyleBody
instance Eq ImportHead
instance Show ImportHead
instance Eq AtImport
instance Show AtImport
instance Eq StyleSheet
instance Show StyleSheet

module Language.Css.Pretty
class Pretty a
pretty :: Pretty a => a -> Doc

-- | pretty-print with the default style.
prettyPrint :: Pretty a => a -> String
instance Pretty Uri
instance Pretty S
instance Pretty Ms
instance Pretty Percentage
instance Pretty Pt
instance Pretty Pc
instance Pretty Mm
instance Pretty Cm
instance Pretty In
instance Pretty Px
instance Pretty Ex
instance Pretty Em
instance Pretty KHz
instance Pretty Hz
instance Pretty Color
instance Pretty Grad
instance Pretty Rad
instance Pretty Deg
instance Pretty Ident
instance Pretty Func
instance Pretty Expr
instance Pretty Value
instance Pretty Attr
instance Pretty SubSel
instance Pretty PseudoVal
instance Pretty SimpleSel
instance Pretty Sel
instance Pretty Prio
instance Pretty Decl
instance Pretty RuleSet
instance Pretty AtFontFace
instance Pretty AtMedia
instance Pretty AtPage
instance Pretty ImportHead
instance Pretty AtImport
instance Pretty AtCharSet
instance Pretty StyleBody
instance Pretty StyleSheet


-- | Combinators to build AST
--   
--   Example :
--   
--   <pre>
--   import Language.Css.Syntax
--   import Language.Css.Build
--   import Language.Css.Pretty
--   import Language.Css.Build.Idents
--   import Language.Css.Build.Tags hiding (center)
--   
--   res = ruleSets [
--            body [
--                margin &lt;:&gt; int 0,
--                border &lt;:&gt; int 0 ],
--               
--            h1 [ textAlign &lt;:&gt; center],
--   
--            p [ 
--               backgroundColor &lt;:&gt; black, 
--               color &lt;:&gt; white,
--               padding &lt;:&gt; spaces [pct 5, pct 5, pct 10, pct 10]  ],
--   
--            (star /. "warning") [ color &lt;:&gt; red ] 
--          ]
--    
--   main = print $ pretty res
--   </pre>
module Language.Css.Build
class Idents a
ident :: Idents a => String -> a
class ToExpr a
expr :: ToExpr a => a -> Expr
styleSheet :: Maybe AtCharSet -> [AtImport] -> [StyleBody] -> StyleSheet

-- | construct <a>StyleSheet</a> from list of <tt>AtRule</tt> 's or
--   <a>RuleSet</a> 's
rules :: [StyleBody] -> StyleSheet

-- | construct <a>StyleSheet</a> from list of <a>RuleSet</a> 's
ruleSets :: [RuleSet] -> StyleSheet

-- | append imports
addImports :: [AtImport] -> StyleSheet -> StyleSheet

-- | append rules
addRules :: [StyleBody] -> StyleSheet -> StyleSheet

-- | set @charset
charset :: String -> StyleSheet -> StyleSheet

-- | @media
media :: [String] -> [RuleSet] -> StyleBody

-- | @page
page :: Maybe String -> Maybe PseudoPage -> [Decl] -> StyleBody

-- | @font-face
fontFace :: [Decl] -> StyleBody

-- | <a>RuleSet</a> constructor
type Sel' = [Decl] -> RuleSet

-- | <tt>*</tt> selector
star :: Sel'

-- | groups selectors
sels :: [Sel'] -> Sel'

-- | Child
--   
--   <tt>&gt;</tt> in css
(/>) :: Sel' -> Sel' -> Sel'

-- | Descendant
--   
--   space in css
(/-) :: Sel' -> Sel' -> Sel'

-- | set id
(/#) :: Sel' -> String -> Sel'

-- | set class
(/.) :: Sel' -> String -> Sel'

-- | set pseudo classes/elements
(/:) :: Sel' -> PseudoVal -> Sel'

-- | attribute selector
class Attrs a
attr :: Attrs a => String -> a

-- | set attributes
(!) :: Sel' -> Attr -> Sel'

-- | element's attribute is
(.=) :: AttrIdent -> AttrVal -> Attr

-- | element's attribute includes
(~=) :: AttrIdent -> AttrVal -> Attr

-- | element's attribute begins with
(|=) :: AttrIdent -> AttrVal -> Attr

-- | declaration constructor
(<:>) :: String -> Expr -> Decl

-- | set <tt>!important</tt>
important :: Decl -> Decl

-- | space separated values
space :: Expr -> Expr -> Expr

-- | slash separated values
slash :: Expr -> Expr -> Expr

-- | comma separated values
comma :: Expr -> Expr -> Expr

-- | <a>space</a> on list of values
spaces :: [Expr] -> Expr

-- | <a>slash</a> on list of values
slashes :: [Expr] -> Expr

-- | <a>comma</a> on lists of values
commas :: [Expr] -> Expr

-- | <a>Func</a> constructor
fun :: ToExpr a => Ident -> a -> Func
str :: String -> Expr
int :: Int -> Expr
num :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;angle&gt;
deg :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;angle&gt;
rad :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;angle&gt;
grad :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;color&gt;
cword :: String -> Expr

-- | &lt;color&gt;
rgb :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Expr

-- | &lt;frequency&gt;
hz :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;frequency&gt;
khz :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
em :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
ex :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
px :: Int -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
in' :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
cm :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
mm :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
pc :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;length&gt;
pt :: Int -> Expr

-- | &lt;percentage&gt;
pct :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;time&gt;
ms :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;time&gt;
s :: Double -> Expr

-- | &lt;uri&gt;
url :: String -> Expr
aqua :: Expr
black :: Expr
blue :: Expr
fuchsia :: Expr
gray :: Expr
green :: Expr
lime :: Expr
maroon :: Expr
navy :: Expr
olive :: Expr
orange :: Expr
purple :: Expr
red :: Expr
silver :: Expr
teal :: Expr
white :: Expr
yellow :: Expr
instance ToExpr Uri
instance ToExpr S
instance ToExpr Ms
instance ToExpr Percentage
instance ToExpr Double
instance ToExpr Pt
instance ToExpr Pc
instance ToExpr Mm
instance ToExpr Cm
instance ToExpr In
instance ToExpr Px
instance ToExpr Ex
instance ToExpr Em
instance ToExpr Int
instance ToExpr Ident
instance ToExpr Func
instance ToExpr KHz
instance ToExpr Hz
instance ToExpr Color
instance ToExpr Grad
instance ToExpr Rad
instance ToExpr Deg
instance ToExpr Value
instance Idents Value
instance Idents Expr
instance ToExpr a => ToExpr [a]
instance Idents PseudoVal
instance Attrs AttrIdent
instance Attrs Attr
instance Idents Attr
instance Idents Sel'
instance ToExpr Expr
instance Idents String
instance Idents Ident


-- | Html 4 ++ Html 5 tags
module Language.Css.Build.Tags

-- | <tt>a</tt> tag
a :: Sel'

-- | Html 4 ++ Html 5 attributes
module Language.Css.Build.Attributes

-- | <tt>abbr</tt> attribute
abbr :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>accept</tt> attribute
accept :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>accept-charset</tt> attribute
acceptCharset :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>accesskey</tt> attribute
accesskey :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>action</tt> attribute
action :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>align</tt> attribute
align :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>alt</tt> attribute
alt :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>archive</tt> attribute
archive :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>async</tt> attribute
async :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>autocomplete</tt> attribute
autocomplete :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>autofocus</tt> attribute
autofocus :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>autoplay</tt> attribute
autoplay :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>axis</tt> attribute
axis :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>background</tt> attribute
background :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>bgcolor</tt> attribute
bgcolor :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>border</tt> attribute
border :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>cellpadding</tt> attribute
cellpadding :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>cellspacing</tt> attribute
cellspacing :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>challenge</tt> attribute
challenge :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>char</tt> attribute
char :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>charoff</tt> attribute
charoff :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>charset</tt> attribute
charset :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>checked</tt> attribute
checked :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>cite</tt> attribute
cite :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>class</tt> attribute
class' :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>classid</tt> attribute
classid :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>clear</tt> attribute
clear :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>codebase</tt> attribute
codebase :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>codetype</tt> attribute
codetype :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>cols</tt> attribute
cols :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>colspan</tt> attribute
colspan :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>compact</tt> attribute
compact :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>content</tt> attribute
content :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>contenteditable</tt> attribute
contenteditable :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>contextmenu</tt> attribute
contextmenu :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>controls</tt> attribute
controls :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>coords</tt> attribute
coords :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>data</tt> attribute
data' :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>datetime</tt> attribute
datetime :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>declare</tt> attribute
declare :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>defer</tt> attribute
defer :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>dir</tt> attribute
dir :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>disabled</tt> attribute
disabled :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>draggable</tt> attribute
draggable :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>enctype</tt> attribute
enctype :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>for</tt> attribute
for :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>form</tt> attribute
form :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>formaction</tt> attribute
formaction :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>formenctype</tt> attribute
formenctype :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>formmethod</tt> attribute
formmethod :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>formnovalidate</tt> attribute
formnovalidate :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>formtarget</tt> attribute
formtarget :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>frame</tt> attribute
frame :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>frameborder</tt> attribute
frameborder :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>headers</tt> attribute
headers :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>height</tt> attribute
height :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>hidden</tt> attribute
hidden :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>high</tt> attribute
high :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>href</tt> attribute
href :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>hreflang</tt> attribute
hreflang :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>hspace</tt> attribute
hspace :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>http-equiv</tt> attribute
httpEquiv :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>icon</tt> attribute
icon :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>id</tt> attribute
id :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>ismap</tt> attribute
ismap :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>item</tt> attribute
item :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>itemprop</tt> attribute
itemprop :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>keytype</tt> attribute
keytype :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>label</tt> attribute
label :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>lang</tt> attribute
lang :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>language</tt> attribute
language :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>list</tt> attribute
list :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>loop</tt> attribute
loop :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>low</tt> attribute
low :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>manifest</tt> attribute
manifest :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>max</tt> attribute
max :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>maxlength</tt> attribute
maxlength :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>media</tt> attribute
media :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>method</tt> attribute
method :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>min</tt> attribute
min :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>multiple</tt> attribute
multiple :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>name</tt> attribute
name :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>nohref</tt> attribute
nohref :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>noshade</tt> attribute
noshade :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>novalidate</tt> attribute
novalidate :: Attrs a => a

-- | <tt>nowrap</tt> attribute
nowrap :: Attrs a => a

onabort :: Attrs a => a

onbeforeonload :: Attrs a => a

onbeforeprint :: Attrs a => a

onblur :: Attrs a => a

oncanplay :: Attrs a => a

oncanplaythrough :: Attrs a => a

onchange :: Attrs a => a

onclick :: Attrs a => a

oncontextmenu :: Attrs a => a

ondblclick :: Attrs a => a

ondrag :: Attrs a => a

ondragend :: Attrs a => a

ondragenter :: Attrs a => a

ondragleave :: Attrs a => a

ondragover :: Attrs a => a

ondragstart :: Attrs a => a

ondrop :: Attrs a => a

ondurationchange :: Attrs a => a

onemptied :: Attrs a => a

onended :: Attrs a => a

onerror :: Attrs a => a

valuetype :: Attrs a => a

vspace :: Attrs a => a

wrap :: Attrs a => a

-- | css 2.1 identifiers
module Language.Css.Build.Idents

-- | above
above :: Idents a => a

-- | absolute
absolute :: Idents a => a

-- | absolute-size
absoluteSize :: Idents a => a

-- | always
always :: Idents a => a

-- | armenian
armenian :: Idents a => a

-- | auto
auto :: Idents a => a

-- | avoid
avoid :: Idents a => a

-- | azimuth
azimuth :: Idents a => a

-- | background
background :: Idents a => a

-- | background-attachment
backgroundAttachment :: Idents a => a

-- | background-color
backgroundColor :: Idents a => a

-- | background-image
backgroundImage :: Idents a => a

-- | background-position
backgroundPosition :: Idents a => a

-- | background-repeat
backgroundRepeat :: Idents a => a

-- | baseline
baseline :: Idents a => a

-- | behind
behind :: Idents a => a

-- | below
below :: Idents a => a

-- | bidi-override
bidiOverride :: Idents a => a

-- | blink
blink :: Idents a => a

-- | block
block :: Idents a => a

-- | bold
bold :: Idents a => a

-- | bolder
bolder :: Idents a => a

-- | border
border :: Idents a => a

-- | border-bottom
borderBottom :: Idents a => a

-- | border-bottom-color
borderBottomColor :: Idents a => a

-- | border-bottom-style
borderBottomStyle :: Idents a => a

-- | border-bottom-width
borderBottomWidth :: Idents a => a

-- | border-collapse
borderCollapse :: Idents a => a

-- | border-color
borderColor :: Idents a => a

-- | border-left
borderLeft :: Idents a => a

-- | border-left-color
borderLeftColor :: Idents a => a

-- | border-left-style
borderLeftStyle :: Idents a => a

-- | border-left-width
borderLeftWidth :: Idents a => a

-- | border-right
borderRight :: Idents a => a

-- | border-right-color
borderRightColor :: Idents a => a

-- | border-right-style
borderRightStyle :: Idents a => a

-- | border-right-width
borderRightWidth :: Idents a => a

-- | border-spacing
borderSpacing :: Idents a => a

-- | border-style
borderStyle :: Idents a => a

-- | border-top
borderTop :: Idents a => a

-- | border-top-color
borderTopColor :: Idents a => a

-- | border-top-style
borderTopStyle :: Idents a => a

-- | border-top-width
borderTopWidth :: Idents a => a

-- | border-width
borderWidth :: Idents a => a

-- | both
both :: Idents a => a

-- | bottom
bottom :: Idents a => a

-- | capitalize
capitalize :: Idents a => a

caption :: Idents a => a

captionSide :: Idents a => a

center :: Idents a => a

centerLeft :: Idents a => a

centerRight :: Idents a => a

child :: Idents a => a

circle :: Idents a => a

clear :: Idents a => a

clip :: Idents a => a

code :: Idents a => a

collapse :: Idents a => a

color :: Idents a => a

content :: Idents a => a

upperAlpha :: Idents a => a

upperLatin :: Idents a => a

upperRoman :: Idents a => a

uppercase :: Idents a => a

verticalAlign :: Idents a => a

xLarge :: Idents a => a

xLoud :: Idents a => a

xLow :: Idents a => a

xSlow :: Idents a => a

xSmall :: Idents a => a

xSoft :: Idents a => a

xxLarge :: Idents a => a

xxSmall :: Idents a => a

zIndex :: Idents a => a

module Language.Css.Build.Pseudos

-- | :first-child
firstChild :: PseudoVal

-- | :link
link :: PseudoVal

-- | :visited
visited :: PseudoVal

-- | :hover
hover :: PseudoVal

-- | :active
active :: PseudoVal

-- | :focus
focus :: PseudoVal

-- | :lang
lang :: Expr -> PseudoVal

-- | :first-line
firstLine :: PseudoVal

-- | :first-letter
firstLetter :: PseudoVal

-- | :before
before :: PseudoVal

-- | :after
after :: PseudoVal
